item.title: Project-and-Code-Management-Software
item.description: See also BLog & Knowledge Base Comparison Online Code (& Project) Management Comparison # updated: 2022-04-16. ref: secrss 安全内参 github .com # gitlab .com (not .org) # gitcode .net (previously code.china.csdn) # free: based on GitLab. learning lab (discontinued): max 10 courses. no other limits? more: 企业入驻流程 cloud.baidu.com 智能云/效率云 # free: people: max 50 (100 during covid-19). repo size: 10GB in total. CI: 1800 min/month. wiki: no ? see ref secrss.
